items.question: How does FRND ensure user safety during video calls?
items.answer: We employ AI-powered monitoring for 100% of video calls, combined with real-time moderation and instant reporting tools. Our system can detect inappropriate behavior and take immediate action.

items.question: What happens when I report someone?
items.answer: We commit to reviewing all reports within 24 hours. Our team investigates each case thoroughly and takes appropriate action, which may include warnings, temporary suspensions, or permanent bans.

items.question: Can I block or remove someone during a call?
items.answer: Yes, you have full control. You can block users, remove them from calls, or kick them out immediately. These actions are instant and the other person cannot rejoin without your permission.

items.question: What if I encounter inappropriate behavior?
items.answer: Use our instant reporting feature or contact our helpline at {{helpline_number}}. Our team is available {{helpline_hours}} to assist you.
